metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18388 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference in vrend_renderer.c in virglrenderer through 0.8.0 allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service via malformed commands.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> intrusive backport to bionic and eoan Nothing in bionic actually uses this package, so we will not be releasing a fix for it. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: virglrenderer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
